description:
The attacker creates a computer object using those permissions with a password known to her.
After that she clears the attribute ServicePrincipalName on the computer object.
Because she created the object (CREATOR OWNER), she gets granted additional permissions and can do many changes to the object.
 Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Exploit SamAccountName Spoofing with Kerberos
query: (winlog.channel:"System" AND ((Provider_Name:"Microsoft\-Windows\-Kerberos\-Key\-Distribution\-Center" AND winlog.event_id:("35" OR "36" OR "37" OR "38")) OR (Provider_Name:"Microsoft\-Windows\-Directory\-Services\-SAM" AND winlog.event_id:("16990" OR "16991"))))
